notes.text: That's right, Dark Magician can still make it to KoG pre-nerf with a little (I actually mean A LOT) of luck against bamboo burn. The econs and FTHs are there to deal with CA, bamboo and sometimes ninjas but also were great against hazy. Otherwise the other decks were traditional burn decks which is where Dark Magic Attack and electro help out a lot. Looking forward to using this deck after the nerfs, but glad I got to steal KoG early with this.
